DESCRIPTION:

    Adventures poludemon Dante, dressed in a scarlet cloak, until recently were available only to owners of gaming consoles. A special edition of the game Devil May Cry 3 Dante's Awakening equalizes the rights of all players. The legendary console shooter finally comes to the PC-platform.

    Gradually, Dante develops his fighting skills, drawing ever more sophisticated combination of acrobatics, weapons and firearms. Intense bouts interspersed with various puzzles and great movies in the anime style gradually reveal the secrets of the exciting story.

    In a special edition of the game is hidden a lot of surprises: additional cinematics and animation, alternative costumes protagonist, 5 playable characters, and much more. The players will have a unique opportunity to play for Virgil, Dante's brother, as well as cross swords with the sinister Jester, boss, present only in a special edition of the game.

GAME FEATURES:

"Cult Japanese third-person shooter;
"Elements RPG: the choice of class and style development battle;
"The evaluation system skill of the player;
"The giant killer arsenal of tools;
"Weight of secrets and bonuses;
"Fantastic soundtrack.
